review.title: “Educational”
review.pros: Pros – They had liberal personal time off days. You received ample PTO plus time four additional summer days, holidays, and the week off between Christmas and New Years.
review.cons: Cons – The pay was a little low. There was high turnover with management and organizational structure. It created a chaotic environment at times.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Over worked under pay - Sounds Great But Run”
review.pros: Pros – PerksCo-WorkersBenefitsOffice LocationThere is room for improvement
review.cons: Cons – Clients are not progressiveManagement is fakeToo many long hoursStop bible thumpingThey really don't care about you or your career
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Stop trying to be a freind to employees - stop gossiping about your clients and coworkers

review.title: “Lots of travel, little time off”
review.pros: Pros – You get to work on some cool promotions.
review.cons: Cons – Very little time off, especially during the summer. Sometimes employees have to take PTO because weekends are spent traveling.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Communicate with employees about changes at the company. Also, avoid the politics.

review.title: “A great job for experience building and looking to advance outside of the agency”
review.pros: Pros – There are a lot of great people that work there.
review.cons: Cons – Communication amongst HR, upper mgmt
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Everyone has talent and a skill set that offers something to the organization. Utilize your talent to its fullest potential.

review.title: “Great client, exposure to industry and top notch vendors and opportunities. Average place to work.”
review.pros: Pros – Large client with large budget to explore. Hands down, best new hire training I've had at a company. Great office location. Good IT team and solutions.
review.cons: Cons – Lack of transparency from upper management. Hired several people and then laid them off. Stemmed from poor planning from upper management.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Great potential never realized is still only a thought. Experimentation requires planning from beginning to end. I would be great to have seen the results of some of the initiatives we implemented.

review.title: “Fun Environment, Great Benefits, but Always Working”
review.pros: Pros – Great benefits and time off, fun work environment, opportunity to work on fun and exciting projects
review.cons: Cons – Standard office hours are 8-5, but you are usually expected to stay late to impress the client (GM). You are attached to your Blackberry 24/7 and often have events in the evenings, weekends and holidays. Very demanding and fast-paced.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “An almost successful company...”
review.pros: Pros – Very good benefitsGood locationGreat time off
review.cons: Cons – Poor management communication between all levels across all departments within the company.Not enough emphasis to gain more clients to keep the company growing.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Put more effort in to find out all the work that goes on behind the scene before making "quick" decisions.
